Subject: Remote session to rotate Web UI TLS Certificates in Dev & Prod servers
Description:
TLS certificates in Web UI (tcp6502 for our custom environment) are going to expire soon and we need to rotate them in the server.
Can we have a remote session to put new certificate files to the Dev and Prod servers?
Date & time proposal: on March 4th, sometime between 14:30 - 17:00 NL time.
What_We_Know__c: The customer would like to update the TLS certificates
Next_Steps__c: a meeting was scheduled for 4th March
Solution_Comment__c: Solved by replacing the certificates from the server's backend
